snippet: Some of the Navy's futuristic weapons sound like something out of "Star Wars," with lasers designed to shoot down aerial drones and electric guns that fire projectiles at hypersonic speeds....

headline.print_headline: US Navy Ready to Deploy Laser for 1st Time
headline.main: US Navy Ready to Deploy Laser for 1st Time

lead_paragraph: Some of the Navy's futuristic weapons sound like something out of "Star Wars," with lasers designed to shoot down aerial drones and electric guns that fire projectiles at hypersonic speeds.
